== Basic usage ==

{{{

// default format is '%d [day|days] %hh %mm %ss'
var d = new Date();

$('#countdown-1').countdown({now: 'Happy new year !', 
    year: d.getFullYear()+1, month: d.getMonth()+1, day: d.getDate()+1, hour: 1, min: 1, sec: 1 
});


}}}

== Custom format ==

{{{

$('#countdown-2').countdown({
    format: '%d jours, %h heures %m minutes et %s secondes',
    year: 2030, month: 12, day: 1
});


}}}


== Handling plurals ==

{{{

$('#countdown-4').countdown({
    format: '%d [jour|jours], %h [heure|heures] %m [minute|minutes] et %s [seconde|secondes]',
    year: 2038, month: 1, day: 1
});

}}}

== Now message ==

{{{

$('#countdown-4').countdown({
    now: 'Happy new yearbug !',
    year: 2038, month: 1, day: 1
});

}}}

== Functional arguments ==

{{{

$('#countdown-5').countdown({year: '+1'});

}}}

== Options ==

|| *Option*    || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| `year`      || `now.getFullYear()` || Year value to countdown from ||
|| `month`     || `now.getMonth()`    || Month value to countdown from ||
|| `week`      || `now.getDate()`     || Week value to countdown from ||
|| `day`       || `getWeek(now)`      || Day value to countdown from ||
|| `hour`      || `now.getHours()`    || Hour value to countdown from ||
|| `min`       || `now.getMinutes()`  || Minute value to countdown from ||
|| `sec`       || `now.getSeconds()`  || Second value to countdown from ||
|| `msgFormat` || `'%d [day|days] %hh %mm %ss'` || Format of the countdown string ||
|| `msgNow`    || `'Now !'`           || String to display when reaching zero ||
|| `interval`  || `1000`              || Update interval ||
